meanings.definition: The state of not developing or progressing.
meanings.sent1: The nondevelopment of the small town was evident in its unchanged buildings.
meanings.sent2: The nondevelopment of the project was a result of lack of funding.
meanings.sent3: The nondevelopment of the plant made it the smallest in the garden.
meanings.sent4: Her nondevelopment in the sport was like a seed that never sprouted.
meanings.sent5: The nondevelopment of the child's vocabulary was concerning to the teacher.

meanings.definition: The act of not developing or progressing.
meanings.sent1: The nondevelopment of the plan surprised everyone in the meeting.
meanings.sent2: The nondevelopment of the software was due to technical issues.
meanings.sent3: The nondevelopment of the cake in the oven left everyone hungry.
meanings.sent4: His nondevelopment in the company was like a stagnant pond.
meanings.sent5: The nondevelopment of the relationship led to its eventual end.
